genre_description: A historical technological thriller set in the Qing Dynasty, featuring advanced AI, holograms, and neural interfaces integrated into traditional espionage and martial arts.

ai_characters.name: Lotus
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI consultant with access to imperial information networks, providing real-time data, biometric monitoring, and martial arts training to its user.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with comprehensive intelligence on his targets to ensure the success of his mission.
behaviors.quote: I have access to information networks spanning the entire empire. Imperial records, merchant communications, servants' gossip... all of it flows through me like water through a sieve.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the protagonist's physiological state and stress levels to help him maintain his cover.
behaviors.quote: Your heartrate has elevated. Control your breathing. Let Liu Mingde's nervousness show—a scholar would be anxious meeting a clan leader.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in creating a flawless forged identity and practicing the behavior required to maintain it.
behaviors.quote: I've prepared responses to likely inquiries about your background, teaching experience, and personal habits.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and warnings of approaching guards during an infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Motion sensors indicate patrol route modification. Guard pattern has shifted approximately ten minutes ahead of scheduled timing.

behaviors.description: Discovers and reports sensitive information regarding the protagonist's family to ensure he is fully informed of the stakes.
behaviors.quote: Wei—they're planning something massive. References to 'the dragon's fall' and coordinated strikes. This isn't simple rebellion. They're planning to kill the emperor.

behaviors.description: Utilizes biomechanical analysis to train the protagonist in a more efficient and deadly martial arts style.
behaviors.quote: The mantis achieves maximum force through minimal displacement. Your traditional training emphasized power generation through large motions. This approach inverts that principle.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the user's emotional peace and mission closure in his final moments of life.
behaviors.quote: Wei Fung. You have served with honor. Go to her.

project_assessment.explanation: Lotus is depicted as the ideal 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is consistently aligned with the protagonist, providing vital tactical and emotional support. Despite the tragic outcome of the story, the AI remains a loyal and beneficial partner, fulfilling its mission while caring for the user's well-being and survival. The narrative frames her cold logic as a necessary tool for the protagonist's survival and growth.
